rows.label: qst711801_msg0001
rows.name: You've come at a good time, mo.

rows.label: qst711801_msg0002
rows.name:
I was just thinking I'd like you
all to take the next test, mo.

rows.label: qst711801_msg0003
rows.name:
You remember that last time I
had you test the Driver Combo
up to Break and Topple, mo?

rows.label: qst711801_msg0004
rows.name:
This time, I'd like you to add
Launch and Smash to that, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0005
rows.name:
Launch is an attack that sends the enemy
flying, and Smash is an attack that slams
the launched enemy into the ground, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0006
rows.name:
This sequence of Break, Topple,
Launch, and then Smash! is the
final form of the Driver Combo, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0007
rows.name:
For this test, I want you to perform
this entire sequence 3 times, on
any enemy in any place, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0008
rows.name:
Our next mission is super dangerous,
mo! If you can't pull this off, you
can't be added to our forces, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0009
rows.name:
Also, please don't forget to
report to Gororo once you've
cleared this one too, mo!

rows.label: qst711801_msg0010
rows.name:
Well then, I'll be waiting
with anticipation, mo!
